snippet: Critics say Mr. Obama, in an effort to curry favor with Turkey, has repeatedly ignored a campaign pledge he made in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Critics say Mr. Obama, in an effort to curry favor with Turkey, has repeatedly ignored a campaign pledge he made in 2008.

headline.main: Despite Campaign Vow, Obama Declines to Call Massacre of Armenians ‘Genocide’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
